front.title: Label Switched Path (LSP) Object Flag Extension for Stateful PCE

abstract.t: RFC 8231 describes a set of extensions to Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) to enable stateful control of MPLS-TE and GMPLS Label Switched Paths (LSPs) via PCEP. One of the extensions is the LSP object which includes a Flag field with a length of 12 bits. However, all bits of the Flag field have already been assigned in RFC 8231, RFC 8281, RFC 8623 and I-D.ietf-pce- binding-label-sid. [Note to RFC Editor - Replace I-D.ietf-pce-binding-label-sid to RFC XXXX, once the RFC number is assigned.] This document proposes to define a new LSP-EXTENDED-FLAG TLV for the LSP object for an extended flag field.
